named-native-query.name: Item.findIdsByColorAndBoxId
named-native-query.query:
WITH tree (id, contained_in) AS ( SELECT id, contained_in FROM box WHERE id = :idBox
UNION ALL
SELECT e.id, e.contained_in FROM tree inner JOIN box as e ON tree.id = e.contained_in )
SELECT item.id FROM tree join item on tree.id = item.contained_in WHERE color= :color
